org.apache.mahout.common.parameters

Interface Parametered

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cluster, DistanceMeasure, Parameter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCluster, AbstractParameter, Canopy, ChebyshevDistanceMeasure, ClassParameter, CosineDistanceMeasure, DistanceMeasureCluster, DoubleParameter, EuclideanDistanceMeasure, Kluster, MahalanobisDistanceMeasure, ManhattanDistanceMeasure, MinkowskiDistanceMeasure, PathParameter, SoftCluster, SquaredEuclideanDistanceMeasure, TanimotoDistanceMeasure, WeightedDistanceMeasure, WeightedEuclideanDistanceMeasure, WeightedManhattanDistanceMeasure

    public interface Parametered
    Meta information and accessors for configuring a job.

      • createParameters

        void createParameters(String prefix,
                    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration jobConf)
        EXPERT: consumers should never have to call this method. It would be friendly visible to Parametered.ParameteredGeneralizations if java supported it. Calling this method should create a new list of parameters and is called
        Parameters:
        prefix - ends with a dot if not empty.
        jobConf - configuration used for retrieving values
        See Also:
        invoking method, invoking method
